trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Arlington
There was one other sighting in Arlington on or around August 15th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI reported yesterday a brilliant flash occurred over my house last night. I am a little offended to be asked if Arlington airport ran at night, indicating I may have seen an airplane's strobe, or landing lights, or running lights. I have lived next to the airport for 30 years. I have seen hundreds of planes landing at night. I have also seen a tumbling fuel tank at night from a shuttle launch. I may have been a very large piece of shiny space junk that had a very slow tumble, and I may have seen it at the moment it aligned with the sun, giving it that that one brilliant burst of light. If anybody has any better suggestion, I would like to know!
